page.title: 05Wicksteed Park
page.content:
People come from miles around to visit the park with its many rides and entertainments and open spaces.Although some of the rides are expensive its well worth it.The most recent ride is the Two Lane Water Slide where you can slip down and have a nice dip in the pool at the end.Another popular ride is the double Pirate Ship which is a large swinging boat.In our survey of visitors ,these two rides proved to be the most popular.
Rides are not payed for individually. Tickets are bought in advance.
